value.title: Deutsche commits to using AI tech from Nvidia throughout the bank
value.excerpt: Deutsche Bank has doubled down on its use of artificial intelligence. The Frankfurt-based bank announced on Wednesday a multi-year partnership with Santa Clara, California-based tech company Nvidia to accelerate and improve artificial intelligence and machine learning throughout the bank.

value.title: Ultra-processed foods linked to cognitive decline, dementia: study

value.title: Alzheimer's drug lecanemab slows cognitive decline among patients in early stages, study finds
